characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: The Boy Who Lived, defeated the Dark Lord, skilled wizard and seeker, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: Brilliant witch, top of her class, co-founder of SPEW, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Ron Weasley
characters.wand_type: Willow, 14 inches, unicorn tail hair core
characters.description: Loyal friend, skilled at wizard chess, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Albus Dumbledore
characters.wand_type: Elder, 15 inches, Thestral tail hair core
characters.special_abilities: Exceptionally skilled wizard, Legilimency, master of the Elder Wand
characters.boggart: The corpse of his sister Ariana
characters.description: Headmaster of Hogwarts, founder of the Order of the Phoenix, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Severus Snape
characters.boggart: Neville Longbottom telling him he failed
characters.description: Potions master, former Death Eater, complex and tormented character, Slytherin house

characters.name: Draco Malfoy
characters.description: Pure-blood wizard, rival of Harry Potter, Slytherin house

characters.name: Rubeus Hagrid
characters.description: Half-giant, gamekeeper at Hogwarts, gentle and loyal, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Minerva McGonagall
characters.description: Transfiguration professor, Deputy Headmistress, Animagus, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Sirius Black
characters.description: Godfather of Harry Potter, member of the Order of the Phoenix, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Remus Lupin
characters.special_abilities: Werewolf, skilled in Defense Against the Dark Arts
characters.description: Kind and knowledgeable, member of the Order of the Phoenix, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Neville Longbottom
characters.description: Brave and determined, member of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Luna Lovegood
characters.description: Unconventional and eccentric, Ravenclaw house

characters.name: Ginny Weasley
characters.description: Courageous and determined, member of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Fred Weasley
characters.description: One of the Weasley twins, co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes, Gryffindor house

characters.name: George Weasley
characters.description: One of the Weasley twins, co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Arthur Weasley
characters.description: Loving father, works at the Ministry of Magic, member of the Order of the Phoenix, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Molly Weasley
characters.description: Loving mother, fierce protector of her family, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Albus Severus Potter
characters.description: Son of Harry Potter and Ginny Weasley, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Scorpius Malfoy
characters.description: Son of Draco Malfoy, close friend of Albus Potter, Slytherin house

characters.name: Seamus Finnigan
characters.description: Irish wizard, member of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Dean Thomas
characters.description: Gryffindor student, member of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Cho Chang
characters.description: Ravenclaw student, seeker for the Ravenclaw Quidditch team, Ravenclaw house

characters.name: Cedric Diggory
characters.description: Hufflepuff student, seeker for the Hufflepuff Quidditch team, Hufflepuff house

characters.name: Fleur Delacour
characters.description: Beauxbatons student, part of the Triwizard Tournament, married to Bill Weasley

characters.name: Viktor Krum
characters.description: Durmstrang student, seeker for the Bulgarian Quidditch team, part of the Triwizard Tournament

characters.name: Bellatrix Lestrange
characters.special_abilities: Unwavering loyalty to Voldemort, skilled duelist
characters.description: Death Eater, tortured Neville Longbottom's parents, Bellatrix's husband was Rodolphus Lestrange

characters.name: Lucius Malfoy
characters.description: Father of Draco Malfoy, wealthy and influential pure-blood wizard

characters.name: Narcissa Malfoy
characters.description: Mother of Draco Malfoy, sister of Bellatrix Lestrange, married to Lucius Malfoy

characters.name: Peter Pettigrew
characters.description: Former friend of James Potter, betrayed the Potters, served Lord Voldemort

characters.name: Horace Slughorn
characters.special_abilities: Slug Club, skilled at brewing potions
characters.description: Former Potions professor, Slytherin house

characters.name: Dobby
characters.special_abilities: House-elf magic, loyalty to Harry Potter
characters.description: House-elf, former servant of the Malfoy family, died while helping Harry Potter

characters.name: Kreacher
characters.description: House-elf, initially loyal to the Black family, later loyal to Harry Potter

characters.name: Filius Flitwick
characters.description: Charms professor, head of Ravenclaw house, part-goblin

characters.name: Gilderoy Lockhart
characters.description: Former Defense Against the Dark Arts professor, fraudulent author, memory charm victim

characters.name: Percy Weasley
characters.description: Ambitious and rule-abiding, worked at the Ministry of Magic, Gryffindor house

characters.description: Ravenclaw student, seeker for the Ravenclaw Quidditch team, Ravenclaw house

characters.description: Gryffindor student, member of the Slug Club, Gryffindor house

characters.description: Gryffindor student, member of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor house

characters.description: Slytherin student, member of the Inquisitorial Squad, Slytherin house

characters.description: Slytherin student, member of Draco Malfoy's gang, Slytherin house

characters.description: Slytherin student, member of Draco Malfoy's gang, Slytherin house

characters.name: Lily Potter
characters.description: Harry Potter's mother, sacrificed herself to save her son

characters.name: James Potter
characters.description: Harry Potter's father, member of the Order of the Phoenix, skilled Quidditch player

characters.name: Lily Luna Potter
characters.description: Daughter of Harry Potter and Ginny Weasley, youngest of the Potter children

characters.name: Victoire Weasley
characters.description: Oldest child of Bill Weasley and Fleur Delacour, part Veela ancestry

characters.name: Dominique Weasley
characters.description: Daughter of Bill Weasley and Fleur Delacour, sister of Victoire Weasley

characters.name: Louis Weasley
characters.description: Son of Bill Weasley and Fleur Delacour, brother of Victoire Weasley

characters.name: Lucy Weasley
characters.description: Daughter of Percy Weasley and Audrey, sister of Molly Weasley II

characters.name: Fred Weasley II
characters.description: Son of George Weasley and Angelina Johnson, nephew of Fred Weasley

characters.name: Roxanne Weasley
characters.description: Daughter of George Weasley and Angelina Johnson, sister of Fred Weasley II

characters.name: Molly Weasley II
characters.description: Daughter of Percy Weasley and Audrey, sister of Lucy Weasley

characters.description: Son of Luna Lovegood and Rolf Scamander, twin brother of Lysander Scamander

characters.name: Lysander Scamander
characters.description: Son of Luna Lovegood and Rolf Scamander, twin brother of Lorcan Scamander

characters.name: Rose Weasley
characters.description: Daughter of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Hugo Weasley
characters.description: Son of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger, Gryffindor house

characters.name: Scorpius Hyperion Malfoy
characters.description: Son of Draco Malfoy and Astoria Greengrass, close friend of Albus Potter, Slytherin house

characters.description: Orphaned son of Remus Lupin and Nymphadora Tonks, godson of Harry Potter

characters.name: Rolf Scamander
characters.description: Husband of Luna Lovegood, magizoologist

characters.name: Luna Lovegood
characters.special_abilities: Unusual beliefs, ability to see Wrackspurts
characters.description: Gryffindor student, member of Dumbledore's Army, Ravenclaw house

characters.name: Rolanda Hooch
characters.special_abilities: Flying instructor, referee for Quidditch matches
characters.description: Flying instructor at Hogwarts, referee for Quidditch matches

characters.name: Aberforth Dumbledore
characters.description: Owner of the Hog's Head Inn, brother of Albus Dumbledore

characters.name: Dilys Derwent
characters.description: Former St. Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries healer

characters.name: Barty Crouch Sr.
characters.special_abilities: Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement
characters.description: Father of Barty Crouch Jr., played a role in the capture of Death Eaters

characters.name: Barty Crouch Jr.
characters.description: Son of Barty Crouch Sr., Death Eater, impersonated Alastor Moody

characters.name: Augusta Longbottom
characters.description: Neville Longbottom's grandmother, member of the Order of the Phoenix

characters.name: Frank Longbottom
characters.description: Neville Longbottom's father, Auror, tortured by Death Eaters

characters.description: Neville Longbottom's mother, Auror, tortured by Death Eaters

characters.name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
characters.special_abilities: High-ranking Auror, skilled at defensive magic
characters.description: Ministry of Magic employee, member of the Order of the Phoenix

characters.name: Nymphadora Tonks
characters.boggart: Seeing loved ones injured or dead
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix, wife of Remus Lupin, mother of Teddy Lupin

characters.name: Dedalus Diggle
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix, known for his enthusiastic personality

characters.name: Elphias Doge
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix, close friend of Albus Dumbledore

characters.name: Emmeline Vance
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix

characters.name: Marlene McKinnon
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix, killed by Death Eaters

characters.name: Arabella Figg
characters.description: Squib, member of the Order of the Phoenix, Harry's neighbor

characters.name: Sturgis Podmore
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix, attempted to break into the Department of Mysteries

characters.name: Regulus Black
characters.description: Brother of Sirius Black, former Death Eater, turned against Lord Voldemort

characters.name: Marietta Edgecombe
characters.description: Ravenclaw student, member of Dumbledore's Army, betrayed the group to Umbridge

characters.name: Narcissa Malfoy
characters.description: Wife of Lucius Malfoy, mother of Draco Malfoy, sister of Bellatrix Lestrange

characters.name: Griphook
characters.description: Goblin, worked at Gringotts Wizarding Bank, aided in the break-in of the Lestrange vault

characters.name: Rufus Scrimgeour
characters.description: Minister for Magic, member of the Order of the Phoenix, killed by Death Eaters

characters.name: Stanley Shunpike
characters.description: Knight Bus conductor, falsely accused of being a Death Eater

characters.name: Dolores Umbridge
characters.description: High Inquisitor, Ministry of Magic employee, cruel and power-hungry

characters.name: Armando Dippet
characters.description: Former Headmaster of Hogwarts, predecessor of Albus Dumbledore

characters.name: Quirinus Quirrell
characters.description: Former Defense Against the Dark Arts professor, host of Lord Voldemort's weakened spirit

characters.name: Tom Riddle
characters.description: Lord Voldemort, founder of the Death Eaters, antagonist of the series
